thread.title: UAE- Hamdan names Al Aulaili CEO of Museum of the Future
thread.title_full: UAE- Hamdan names Al Aulaili CEO of Museum of the Future | MENAFN.COM

author: Khaleej Times
title: UAE- Hamdan names Al Aulaili CEO of Museum of the Future
text: (MENAFN - Khaleej Times)Shaikh Hamdan bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Crown Prince of Dubai and Chairman of the Board of Trustees of Dubai Foundation for the Museum of the Future issued a resolution appointing Saif Abdullah Al Aulaili as Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the Dubai Foundation for the Museum of the Future. Hamdan's resolution follows Law No (19) of 2015 issued by His Highness Shaikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktou Vice-President and Prime Minister of the UAE and Ruler of Dubai on the Establishment of the Dubai Foundation for the Museum of the Future and Decree No (27) of 2015 on the Formation of the Board of Trustees of Dubai Foundation for the Museum of the Future under the chairmanship of Shaikh Hamdan. Shaikh Hamdan's decision reflects his support for the development of national talent and recruitment of young Emiratis to give them an opportunity to participate in Dubai's development. The Dubai Foundation for the Museum of the Future is a non-profit research institution dedicated to science and the future of innovation and exploring the next generation of technology.
